controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AdminController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Will display the admin subsystem and allow for the creation and the deletion of users. It will also list all current users.
    Author:
    Rizwan Khan(mrk150) && Ahmed Ghoneim(asg179)

        public void buttonPushed2(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        The action of pushing a button. Will create a user, delete a user, or logout.
        Parameters:
        e - Pushing a button

        public void saveUserList()
        Serializes the list of users into "userArrayList.ser" file in the same working folder

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()

      • loadUsers

        public void loadUsers()
        Loads users into a list. If a serializable file already exits in the same of "userArrayList.ser", it will deserialize that. Else it will use the logout.txt upon the first run.
